net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.widget.complex

Interface UiWidgetTableColumn<ROW,CELL>

  • Type Parameters:
    ROW - is the generic type of the element representing a row of the grid. It should be a java-bean oriented object. Immutable objects (that have no setters) can also be used but only for read-only tables.
    CELL - is the generic type of the values located in the cells of this column.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractValidatableObject, Accessibility, AttributeReadAriaRole, AttributeReadDisposed, AttributeReadEditable, AttributeReadEnabled, AttributeReadHtmlId, AttributeReadId<String>, AttributeReadMode, AttributeReadModeFixed, AttributeReadModified, AttributeReadPrimaryStyle, AttributeReadReorderable, AttributeReadResizable, AttributeReadSortable, AttributeReadSortComparator<CELL>, AttributeReadStringTitle, AttributeReadStyles, AttributeReadStylesAdvanced, AttributeReadTitle<String>, AttributeReadTooltip, AttributeReadVisible, AttributeReadVisibleRecursive, AttributeWriteDisposed, AttributeWriteEditable, AttributeWriteEnabled, AttributeWriteHtmlId, AttributeWriteId<String>, AttributeWriteMode, AttributeWriteModeFixed, AttributeWritePrimaryStyle, AttributeWriteReorderable, AttributeWriteResizable, AttributeWriteSortable, AttributeWriteSortComparator<CELL>, AttributeWriteStringTitle, AttributeWriteStyles, AttributeWriteStylesAdvanced, AttributeWriteTitle<String>, AttributeWriteTooltip, AttributeWriteVisible, AttributeWriteVisibleAdvanced, HasValueValidators<CELL>, UiFeature, UiFeatureEvent, UiFeatureMessages, UiFeatureMode, UiWidget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetTableColumn, UiWidgetTableColumnImpl

    public interface UiWidgetTableColumn<ROW,CELL>
extends UiWidget, HasValueValidators<CELL>, AttributeWriteStringTitle, AttributeWriteEditable, AttributeWriteResizable, AttributeWriteSortable, AttributeWriteReorderable, AttributeWriteSortComparator<CELL>
    This is the interface for a virtual UiWidget that represents the column of a data table.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • sort

        void sort()
        Like sort(SortOrder) but will toggle the SortOrder state of this column.

      • sort

        void sort(SortOrder order)
        This method sorts the table-data according to this column using the sort-comparator and the given order.
        Parameters:
        order - is the SortOrder.

      • isSortable

        boolean isSortable()
        Description copied from interface: AttributeReadSortable
        This method determines if this object can be sorted.
        Specified by:
        isSortable in interface AttributeReadSortable
        Returns:
        true if a sort comparator is set and this column allows sorting, false otherwise (if AttributeReadSortComparator.getSortComparator() is null).
